attributes.action: Police who shoot or beat citizens unprovoked should be sacked and convicted
attributes.additional_details:
There is a petition to suggest looters should lose their benefits. Genius. Take the only legit money many poor people receive, yea, that'll stop robbings!

Instead we should work towards more accountability for the people who caused this problem in the first place. This keeps happening, police can kill and beat civilians (US!) and get away scot free and we just let it fly, no worse, we make calls to further push down the people who are worst affected by the imbalance in our society.
